JobFullDesc: About the Role  Join one of Uber’s fastest growing verticals, Uber for Business (U4B), where we bring consumer product level quality to serve some of the largest enterprise customers in the world. In this high-visibility role, you will be a key strategic partner to senior members of the leadership team. You will drive and execute high-impact org-wide initiatives to increase the effectiveness of our product and engineering organizations. The role demands great technical depth, principled thinking, a high bar for quality, and ambitious innovation. Working alongside a cross-functional team that includes Engineering, Product, Data Science, and Operations in a fast-paced environment, you will build and deliver technology solutions that power our U4B enterprise solution. You enjoy ambiguity and feel comfortable leading through influence. What the Candidate Will Do  As a Sr TPM focused on creating enterprise grade APIs, you will work closely with product and engineering teams to understand customer needs and unlock revenue generating opportunities. In addition you will: Organize and execute as an important member of the U4B teamPrioritize key critical initiatives based on impact through a data-focused lensAnticipate and proactively solve long term system challenges through a deep understanding of business, product, and technologyChampion and lead effective decision making for world class system and architectural designsPartner with the leadership and their extended teams to drive the communication and execution within the organization.Lead short-term deep dives and cross-functional project teams to structure and execute analyses needed to develop recommendations. Lead critical projects based on emergent business needs.Develop and contribute to internal and external knowledge basesBuild enterprise grade endpoints for reliability, availability, low latency, and scalability.Basic Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Mathematics, related quantitative subject area, or equivalent practical experience.8+ years experience as a TPM or Engineering Manager in a software, SaaS, or systems development environment.Experience with or solid understanding of end-to-end software developmentSolid technical aptitude and an ability to understand technical designs, challenges, and risks.
